refnamediv.refpurpose: dynamic class and object aggregation of methods

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Aggregates all methods defined in a class to an existing object, except for the class constructor, or methods whose names start with an underscore character (_) which are considered private to the aggregated class.
refsect1.simpara: See also aggregate, aggregate_info, aggregate_methods_by_list, aggregate_methods_by_regexp, aggregate_properties, aggregate_properties_by_list, aggregate_properties_by_regexp, deaggregate
